Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: Italian couple Giulia (Giovanna Mezzogiorno) and Carlo (Stefano Accorsi) are in a happy and stable relationship. But when Giulia reveals she's pregnant, Carlo is terrified of the responsibility that a child represents. He becomes infatuated with a young woman he meets at a wedding, Francesca (Martina Stella), and pursues what he thinks will be a carefree tryst. Meanwhile, his friends and relatives deal with their own relationship issues in odd ways, including infidelity and travel plans.
Title: The Last Kiss
